name: Ghost Runner (sonya1026)
description:
Hello everyone,

I'm proud to present to you my game, Ghost Runner. 

The instructions are included in the game, but the controls are the arrow keys. You can jump over sticks, roll under birds, and slide through mud. Be careful not to trip, because you might get hurt—or worse.

The game is made using Unity and the art is all original, drawn on Procreate.

Sound effects are by Eric Matyas at soundimage.org

Thanks for checking out my game. I hope you enjoy!

Sonya
